name: Huguenot Cemetery Virtual Tour
description:
This is a project I did in college as part of my degree and is non profit. This game was meant to be used for educational purposes.  

Its a virtual tour of the Huguenots cemetery found in Cork in Ireland which is rarely open to the public for the sake of preservation. This was used as a artifact in a research project to discuss game based learning and to be and example of the benefits of virtual preservation. All assets in the project where captured using either laser scanning of Photogrammetry techniques. 

video of the project in action https://vimeo.com/manage/281222694/general
